name: Vampire's hunt (flavedogame)
description:
arrow keys to move, space to consume the tiles, mouse click to select an upgrade

when there are pink tiles on your board, move to it before it is pollute

There are 7 types of enemies:

1. melee enemy

2. shooting enemy

3. magic enemy that would pollute a tile

4. shooting enemy that would shoot bullets that follow you

5. magic enemy that would do aoe attack

6. shooting enemy that would shoot more than one arrow at a time

7. magic enemy that would heal other enemies

Due to time limitation, we only have three variation of enemies visually in game now so it might be a little confused. Sorry about that!

Credits:

Flavedo: Programmer, Designer

Bird: Artist
